scripts.dev: concurrently -n next,forecast,mailjet,cosmic,google-search,mailchimp 'npm run next:dev' 'npm run forecast:dev' 'npm run mailjet:dev' 'npm run cosmic:dev' 'npm run google-search:dev' 'npm run mailchimp:dev'
